metadata.title: CVE-2024-34251 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bound memory read vulnerability was discovered in BytecodeAlliance wasm-micro-runtime v2.0.0 which allows a remote attacker to causea denial of service via the "block_type_get_arity" function incore/iwasm/interpreter/wasm.h.

criterions.comment: netdata package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
